# normalizeme

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of normalizeme is to help with the normalization of data. It also contains a few functions to help plot a very simple graph, in case you want to visualize the normalized data quickly. In any case this package also contains a very small data set to try out the package. Its a very simple two column data frame. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of normalizeme from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("LunarEclipse112/normalizeme")
```
